item.title: 众议院监督委员会的头号民主党人、众议员杰米-拉斯金（Jamie Raskin）在 @ABC 新闻最早获得的一封信中抨击了众议院共和党人在弹劾拜登总统的调查中的头号证人之一托尼-博布林斯基（Tony Bobulinski）。
item.description: The top Democrat on the House Oversight Committee, Rep. Jamie Raskin, slammed Tony Bobulinski, one of House Republicans' top witnesses in their impeachment inquiry into Pres. Biden, in a letter first obtained by @ABC News. trib.al/RYztjt9

item.title: 周二，一场强风暴继续给西海岸大部分地区带来雨雪和狂风，从南部的圣地亚哥到北部的雷丁，整个加利福尼亚州的洪水警报仍然有效。
item.description: A flood watch remains in effect Tuesday across California, from San Diego in the south to Redding in the north, as a powerful storm continues to unleash rain, snow and wind on much of the West Coast. trib.al/UBEDItp

item.title: 乔-拜登（Joe Biden）总统将于周二前往加利福尼亚州，在为期三天的行程中为竞选连任筹集更多资金。
item.description: President Joe Biden heads to California on Tuesday looking to soak up more cash for his reelection bid during a three-day swing through the state. trib.al/wcoVaY6

item.title: 拜登政府表示，它将为全国各地的水利基础设施项目再分配 58 亿美元，这笔资金由其取得的一项重要立法胜利支付。
item.description: The Biden administration says it is distributing another $5.8 billion for water infrastructure projects around the country, paid for by one of its key legislative victories. trib.al/1aMrVK2

item.title: 夏洛特-考尔斯（Charlotte Cowles）是 "The Cut "杂志的财经建议专栏作家，她透露，她用鞋盒装了 5 万美元交给了骗子--这是一场精心策划的骗局的一部分，而这一切都源于一个电话。
item.description: Charlotte Cowles, the financial advice columnist for “The Cut,” revealed she delivered scammers $50,000 in a shoe box — part of an elaborate hoax that all started with a phone call. trib.al/BXsJJS5

item.title: 生日快乐："雨伞 "歌手兼企业家蕾哈娜今天 36 岁。
item.description: HAPPY BIRTHDAY: "Umbrella" singer and entrepreneur Rihanna is 36 today. trib.al/MIbLNwm

item.title: 观看直播：ABC 新闻直播间提供当天的头条新闻和最新报道，现在即可观看。
item.description: WATCH LIVE: ABC News Live has the day's top stories and up-to-the-minute reports, streaming now. trib.al/he7RhJt

item.title: 伦敦警方周二表示，他们 "坚信 "已经从泰晤士河中打捞出一具尸体，此人涉嫌对其前伴侣及其两个年幼的女儿进行化学攻击。
item.description: London police said Tuesday they “strongly believe” they have pulled the body of a man suspected of chemically attacking his former partner and her two young daughters out of the River Thames. trib.al/zlAPN02

item.title: 据官方称，去年在死亡谷国家公园再次出现的一个古老湖泊将比最初预计的时间更长，因为南加州已经下了几轮特大暴雨。
item.description: An ancient lake that reemerged at Death Valley National Park last year will stick around for longer than initially expected now that several rounds of extreme rain have poured through Southern California, according to officials. trib.al/sCvG6oF

item.title: 最新消息：克里姆林宫官员周二拒绝了对反对派领袖阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的遗体进行独立尸检的呼吁。
item.description: JUST IN: Kremlin officials rejected a call Tuesday for an independent postmortem examination on the remains of opposition leader Alexei Navalny. trib.al/jdkZIef

item.title: 最新消息：克里姆林宫官员周二拒绝了对反对派领袖阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的遗体进行独立尸检的呼吁。
item.description: JUST IN: Kremlin officials rejected a call Tuesday for an independent postmortem examination on the remains of opposition leader Alexei Navalny. trib.al/i9ixdWR

item.title: 当局称，在对无人机向西弗吉尼亚州一所联邦监狱运送毒品的指控进行调查后，11 名嫌疑人已被逮捕。
item.description: Eleven suspects have been arrested following an investigation into drugs allegedly delivered by drones into a federal prison in West Virginia, authorities say. trib.al/E76MLFt

item.title: 法尼-威利斯（Fani Willis）道德案件在法官做出判决后可能会长期反响：专家。
item.description: Fani Willis ethics case may reverberate long after judge decision: Experts. trib.al/igQLdOk

item.title: 马萨诸塞州的一些地方官员要求州长莫拉-希利（Maura Healey）派遣国民警卫队制止暴力事件，并解决波士顿南部一所高中的安全问题。
item.description: Some local officials in Massachusetts are asking Gov. Maura Healey to send in the National Guard to stop violence and address security concerns at a high school south of Boston. trib.al/ozUNDRw

item.title: 首例基于性别认同的仇恨犯罪联邦审判即将开始，一名南卡罗来纳州男子将面临指控，称他向一名变性黑人妇女头部连开三枪，将其杀害。
item.description: The first federal trial over a hate crime based on gender identity is set to begin, when a South Carolina man will face charges that he killed a Black transgender woman by shooting her three times in the head. trib.al/EIqV0XT

item.title: 在堪萨斯城酋长队超级碗游行中发生致命枪击事件后不到一周，密苏里州共和党领导的众议院就通过了一项禁止城市庆祝用枪的禁令。
item.description: Missouri's Republican-led House has passed a ban on celebratory gunfire in cities less than a week after a deadly shooting at the Kansas City Chiefs' Super Bowl parade. trib.al/IZ0WpVg

item.title: 在中国，一段无人机拍摄的视频捕捉到了狼群在厚厚的积雪中灵巧地开辟出一条隧道的壮观景象。
item.description: A drone video captured the remarkable sight of a wolf pack deftly trekking through thick layers of snow by creating a tunnel in China.

item.title: 台湾抗议中国登上一艘旅游船，因为金门群岛周围的紧张局势正在加剧。
item.description: Taiwan is protesting China’s boarding of a tourist boat as tensions rise around the Kinmen archipelago, which lies just off the Chinese coast but is controlled by Taiwan. trib.al/B2erYgQ

item.title: 据匈牙利执政党菲德斯党（Fidesz）的一名高级成员称，匈牙利议会最早可能于下周一就批准瑞典加入北约的申请进行投票。
item.description: A vote in Hungary's parliament on ratifying Sweden's bid to join NATO could come as early as Monday, according to a senior member of the country's governing Fidesz party. trib.al/9aQ4enh

item.title: 1962年，宇航员约翰-格伦（John Glenn）乘坐 "水星计划 "的 "友谊7号 "飞船环绕地球三圈后安全降落在大西洋上，成为第一位绕地球飞行的美国人。
item.description: ON THIS DAY: In 1962 astronaut John Glenn became the first American to orbit the Earth as he flew aboard Project Mercury’s Friendship 7 spacecraft, which circled the globe three times before splashing down safely in the Atlantic Ocean. trib.al/AVvLBds

item.title: 三名男子被指控合谋拥有并试图出售《加州旅馆》（Hotel California）和其他老鹰乐队名曲的手稿，但却无权这样做。
item.description: Three men are charged with conspiring to own and try to sell manuscripts of “Hotel California” and other Eagles hits without the right to do so. trib.al/5IFgMI1

item.title: 科罗拉多斯普林斯一所大学校园内发生两起凶杀案，一名学生因涉嫌此案于周一被拘留。
item.description: A student was taken into custody Monday in connection with a double homicide on a university campus in Colorado Springs, officials say. trib.al/caFKyu8

item.title: 天文学家发现了可能是宇宙中最亮的天体--一颗类星体，它的中心有一个黑洞，黑洞的生长速度非常快，每天吞下的黑洞相当于一个太阳。
item.description: Astronomers have discovered what may be the brightest object in the universe — a quasar with a black hole at its heart growing so fast that it swallows the equivalent of a sun a day. trib.al/0Zzu0Iw

item.title: 亚历山大-安萨里（Alexandre Ansari）2012 年在底特律枪杀了一名 15 岁的女孩伊莱亚娜-奎瓦斯（Ileana Cuevas），并打伤了另外两人。
item.description:
Alexandre Ansari, who was awarded $10 million in damages, was wrongfully serving a life sentence over claims that in 2012 he shot and killed Ileana Cuevas, a 15-year-old girl, and wounded two others in Detroit.
trib.al/NgooWcZ

item.title: 乌克兰总理丹尼斯-什米哈尔（Denys Shmyhal）周二表示，乌克兰需要远程导弹和其他弹药来结束俄罗斯的入侵。
item.description: Ukrainian Prime Minister Denys Shmyhal said on Tuesday that his country needs long-range missiles and other ammunition to end Russia's invasion, and said he expects a U.S. aid package that's stalled in Congress to come through. trib.al/NEhDxFA

item.title: 韩国实习医生周二集体离职，将他们对政府医疗政策的抗议升级，引发医院取消手术和其他治疗。
item.description:
South Korean trainee doctors collectively walked off their jobs Tuesday to escalate their protest of a government medical policy, triggering cancellations of surgeries and other medical treatments at hospitals.
trib.al/Uz2RvlB

item.title: 据联邦官员称，一名 83 岁的老人因 20 世纪 80 年代的一连串银行抢劫案而被监禁了三十多年，如今他又身陷囹圄。
item.description: An 83-year-old man imprisoned for more than three decades for a string of 1980s bank robberies is back behind bars, according to federal officials. trib.al/a100SKq

item.title: 医学专家对黑人糖尿病截肢患者日益增多敲响了警钟。
item.description: Medical experts sound the alarm on growing diabetic amputations among Black patients. trib.al/P4rlirO

item.title: 在确定底特律前警探莫伊塞斯-希门尼斯（Moises Jimenez）在对安萨里的审判中隐瞒了可能牵连到其他枪手的证据后，39 岁的安萨里被免罪。
item.description:
Ansari, 39, was exonerated after it determined that Moises Jimenez, a former Detroit police detective withheld evidence for Ansari’s trial that would have implicated someone else as the shooter.
trib.al/EZBiYkz

item.title: 印第安纳州的一位母亲说，她的第二个孩子被诊断出患有先天性心脏缺陷，并在新生儿重症监护室住了近两个月，这给了她转行的灵感。
item.description: An Indiana mother says she was inspired to change careers after her second child was diagnosed with congenital heart defects and spent nearly two months in a neonatal intensive care unit. trib.al/567Aqno
